thread.title: Watch: Matt Maher's 60-second Wolves update - October 12
thread.title_full: Watch: Matt Maher's 60-second Wolves update - October 12

title: Watch: Matt Maher's 60-second Wolves update - October 12
text:
Be the first to comment 
The London-born defender, who enjoyed a loan spell with Gillingham towards the end of 2014, took his place in Wolves’ back-line upon return and has not looked back since. 
Former skipper Richard Stearman was sold to Fulham for £2million after it was reported he was ‘being overtaken’ by the club’s youngsters Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
